On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Cranfill, Wendy wrote:
>
> Also, after being terrified of using AE and aggroing the tower, I finally
> tried it and I had no problems. Anyway keep Selo's handy and your little
> magic resist song cuz those casters suck.

It's like what they say about nuclear war. Don't worry about
it. If it happens, you'll be dead before you realize it's
happening. :)

The mobs in the tower could typically nuke me for 2 bubbles at
L42 (my MR was a base of 61 back then). There are 5 mobs in
the tower, all of which can be casters. You do the math.

--
John H. Kim
